description: Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) filing information on record with the Secretary of State. This dataset includes UCC financing statements, effective financing statements (EFS), and liens. Fields in this dataset include action type, record status and secured party name and address. The Business Division files financing statements and notices of security interests in agricultural products pursuant to the Uniform Commercial Code, federal tax liens and other miscellaneous statutory liens.

name: Colorado Secured Party Information
